title: DurableAgent E2E Tests & Feature Parity with AI SDK ToolLoopAgent
description:
Ensure DurableAgent has full feature compatibility with AI SDK's ToolLoopAgent and is comprehensively tested and documented.

## Goal
DurableAgent should match the test coverage and feature parity of ToolLoopAgent from the AI SDK, with comprehensive E2E tests that don't mock the streamTextIterator.

## Background
Currently DurableAgent tests mock streamTextIterator, which means we're not testing the full integration. The AI SDK has extensive tests for streamText multi-step tool calling that we should mirror.

## Scope
1. Port/adapt test utilities from AI SDK
2. Add real integration tests (not mocked)
3. Test all features that AI SDK tests for ToolLoopAgent
4. Document DurableAgent API and behavior
5. Ensure providerMetadata/providerOptions flow is fully tested

title: Port AI SDK test utilities to @workflow/ai
description:
Port essential test utilities from AI SDK to enable real integration testing.

## Utilities to Port
- `MockLanguageModelV3` - Full model mock with doStream/doGenerate
- `convertArrayToReadableStream` - Essential for mocking streams
- `mockId({ prefix: 'id' })` - Predictable ID generation
- `mockValues(v1, v2, v3)` - Sequential mock value returns
- `convertAsyncIterableToArray` - Stream consumption
- `MockTracer` - Telemetry verification (if needed)

## Source Files
- `/packages/ai/src/test/mock-language-model-v3.ts`
- `/packages/provider-utils/test/`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Test utilities available in @workflow/ai test helpers
- [ ] Can create mock models that return streams
- [ ] Can verify stream consumption

title: Add E2E tests for experimental_transform
description:
Test stream transformation pipeline.

## Test Scenarios
- Single transform applied
- Multiple transforms chained
- Transform that stops stream (stopStream)
- Transform that modifies chunks
- Transform error handling

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Transforms applied correctly
- [ ] stopStream terminates iteration
- [ ] Multiple transforms compose correctly

title: Document DurableAgent API and feature parity with AI SDK
description:
Create comprehensive documentation for DurableAgent.

## Documentation Sections
1. Overview and purpose (durable/resumable agent execution)
2. API reference (constructor options, stream options)
3. Feature comparison with AI SDK streamText/ToolLoopAgent
4. Examples:
   - Basic tool calling
   - Multi-step conversations
   - Custom prepareStep
   - Error handling with FatalError
   - Abort handling
5. Integration with workflow durability
6. Migration guide from AI SDK

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] API fully documented
- [ ] Examples for all major features
- [ ] Feature parity table with AI SDK

title: Add TypeScript type tests for DurableAgent
description:
Add .test-d.ts type tests similar to AI SDK's tool-loop-agent.test-d.ts.

## Test Scenarios
- Tool input/output type inference
- ToolSet type constraints
- StreamOptions type checking
- Callback parameter types
- Return type inference

## Reference
- `/packages/ai/src/agent/tool-loop-agent.test-d.ts` (115 lines)

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Type tests for tool definitions
- [ ] Type tests for callbacks
- [ ] Type tests for stream result

title: Add E2E tests for multi-step tool call iteration
Add E2E tests for parallel tool execution
description:
Test parallel tool call handling in DurableAgent.

## Test Scenarios
- Multiple tool calls in single response
- All tools execute concurrently
- Results collected and passed back correctly
- Order independence of parallel results

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Parallel tool calls are verified
- [ ] Execution timing shows concurrency
- [ ] Results correctly associated with tool call IDs

title: Add E2E tests for providerMetadata/providerOptions flow
description:
Comprehensive tests for providerMetadata preservation across the full flow.

## Test Scenarios
- providerMetadata on tool calls flows to providerOptions in prompt
- providerMetadata on finish chunk is captured in step result
- Gemini thoughtSignature scenario (multi-turn with metadata)
- Mixed tool calls with/without metadata
- Metadata through multiple steps

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Full E2E test of metadata flow
- [ ] Gemini-like scenario tested
- [ ] Step result providerMetadata verified

title: Add E2E tests for abort signal handling
description:
Test abort signal handling during stream iteration.

## Test Scenarios
- Abort before stream starts
- Abort mid-stream (during text generation)
- Abort during tool execution
- Abort between steps
- onAbort callback invocation
- Cleanup verification

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Mid-stream abort tested
- [ ] Cleanup verified
- [ ] onAbort callback tested

title: Add E2E tests for callbacks (onStepFinish, onError, onFinish)
description:
Test all callback invocations during agent execution.

## Test Scenarios
- onStepFinish called after each step with correct data
- onStepFinish step result contains: text, toolCalls, toolResults, usage, finishReason
- onError called on tool failure
- onError called on model error
- onFinish called with final steps and messages
- Callback order verification

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All callbacks tested with real iteration
- [ ] Callback arguments verified
- [ ] Error scenarios tested

title: Add E2E tests for prepareStep callback
description:
Test prepareStep callback for dynamic step configuration.

## Test Scenarios
- Modify system prompt per step
- Switch model mid-conversation
- Modify messages before step
- Update experimental_context
- Filter activeTools per step
- Override generation settings (temperature, maxTokens, etc.)
- Modify toolChoice per step

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All prepareStep return values tested
- [ ] Dynamic model switching verified
- [ ] Message injection verified

title: Add E2E tests for UIMessageStream output
description:
Test that UIMessageChunks are correctly written to the writable stream.

## Test Scenarios
- text-start, text-delta, text-end chunks
- reasoning-start, reasoning-delta, reasoning-end chunks
- tool-input-start, tool-input-delta, tool-input-available chunks
- tool-output-available chunks
- file chunks
- source-url, source-document chunks
- error chunks
- start, start-step, finish-step chunks

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All chunk types tested
- [ ] Chunk order verified
- [ ] Chunk content verified

title: Add E2E tests for reasoning, sources, and files
description:
Test handling of extended content types in responses.

## Test Scenarios
- Reasoning content (thinking models)
- URL sources
- Document sources
- Generated files (images, etc.)
- Mixed content types in single response

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Reasoning text captured in step result
- [ ] Sources captured correctly
- [ ] Files converted and captured

title: Run build and typecheck
